Publications

Peer-Reviewed Articles

Global and Planetary Change, 251, 104808. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.gloplacha.2025.104808

  2. Guo, H., Pang, H., Wu, S., Xu, T., Mutz, S. G. , Zhan, Z., Lin, W., Zhang, W. and Hou, S. (2024) Global abnormal precipitation δ18O depletion during late/post monsoon season. Earth and Planetary Science Letters, 641, 118815. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.epsl.2024.118815

  3. Boateng, D., Aryee, J. N.A., Baidu, M., Arthur, F. and Mutz, S. G. (2024) West African Monsoon dynamics and its control on the stable oxygen isotopic composition of precipitation in the Late Cenozoic. Journal of Geophysical Research: Atmospheres, 129(10), e2024JD040. https://doi.org/10.1029/2024JD040748

  4. Boateng, D. and Mutz, S. G. (2023). pyESD: An open-source Python framework for empirical-statistical downscaling of climate information. Geoscientific Model Development. https://doi.org/10.5194/gmd-16-6479-2023
